name: kite
description: Python coding assistant featuring AI-powered autocompletions, advanced function signatures, and instant documentation

editorMetricsEnabled.title: Editor metrics enabled
editorMetricsEnabled.description: Kite can periodically send information to our servers about the status of the Kite application to ensure that is is running correctly

showWelcomeNotificationOnStartup.title: Show welcome features on startup
showWelcomeNotificationOnStartup.description: Whether to display the Kite welcome features on startup

showEditorVacanciesNotificationOnStartup.title: Notify me when Kite supports other editors
showEditorVacanciesNotificationOnStartup.description: Kite can notify me on startup if it is available for other editors on my system

enableCompletions.title: Enable completions
enableCompletions.description: Show auto-completions from Kite as Atom suggestions

enableHoverUI.title: Enable hover info
enableHoverUI.description: Show hover information when placing the mouse over a programming expression

hideDocumentationWhenSignatureIsAvailabl.title: Hide documentation when signature is available
hideDocumentationWhenSignatureIsAvailabl.description: Display only signature if both the signature and documentation are available at the same time

loggingLevel.title: Logging level
loggingLevel.description: The verbosity level of Kite logs

developerMode.title: Developer mode
developerMode.description: Enable Kite developer mode, displaying received data in the various UIs

startKiteAtStartup.description: Automatically start Kite process on startup if it's not already running.
